file_content.text: Let's get to the hangar. Hurry!
I'm going to help Narlock make a distraction. Hurry to the bridge!
I don't know how you managed it, but you did. The security doors around the bridge have opened.
No challenge is too great.
I don't know where I'd be if you hadn't been aboard. Probably locked in an Imperial prison. Or worse.
The bridge is open, and no innocent lives had to be sacrificed to do it.
The alternative worked.
You were right--I'm sorry. Please understand, I didn't want to kill anyone, I just... it seemed like the only way to be sure.
I know what I'm doing, Ambassador.
Never doubt me again.
I won't argue with that.
We'd better get going. We need to attack Ironfist now, before he has time to recover.
This opportunity was costly. We can't afford to waste it.
I agree.
That's right. We have to make those men's sacrifice count.
We went too far here.
It was the only way to be sure.
Innocent people just died to give us this chance, and that's all you can say?
I can't believe you!
If we don't take advantage of this chance, those people will have died for nothing. We have to move on.
I'll go and help Narlock with another diversion. So you have as little resistance as possible when you attack the bridge.
You'll still have to deal with Ironfist, though. And that's no small challenge.
What do you know about Ironfist?
Tell me about him.
Ironfist is nothing.
That's good. Most people would panic when faced with an experienced Mandalorian--or any Mandalorian, really.
You're just wasting my time here.
I don't need advice.
You need to know what you're up against.
I only know Ironfist by reputation, but he's been doing Grand Moff Kilran's dirty work for a long time now.
He's never been captured, defeated or even driven back. You have your work cut out for you.
The Force will give me the strength I'll need.
I will succeed.
Where there is a will, there is a way. I will not fail.
He must be stopped.
They didn't just train me to do the easy jobs, ma'am.
I can handle this.
So if Ironfist goes down, I become famous. Works for me.
That is quite a reputation.
I'm not sure if fame should be the first thing on your mind at a time like this.
You worry too much.
I'll just kill him like I kill everyone else who gets in my way.
Everyone dies eventually.
Just be careful. Mandalorians always have a few tricks up their sleeves.
All right, no more time to waste. Narlock, are you there? Can you hear me?
Copy, this is Narlock! Set for second offensive?
That's right, Commander. I'm on my way to join you now.
I'm ready.
Let's hope Ironfist isn't paying too much attention.
This could get interesting.
Narlock and I will do our best to keep him distracted.
I'll make this scum pay for attacking us.
Revenge will feel good.
Good luck.
Hurry down to engineering!
This really isn't a good time.
We have to get the tractor beam shut down, or we'll never escape.
Listen, we've got to shut down those turbolasers, or the Esseles is done for.
Forget about him!
We'd better get the engines, too, or he'll just run us down again. Come on!
